attributes.action: A UK Referendum on Scottish Independence
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron stated
“It is now up to the people of Scotland to make that historic decision. The very future of Scotland depends on their verdict. It is that important. This agreement delivers the people’s referendum.”

In a democracy, all affected parties should have the chance to vote,  We the undersigned believe that a related petition should be held at the same time for the other countries within the United Kingdom & Northern Ireland.  The question to be placed in front of the all of the people should be exactly the same.

When something this fundamental to the make up of the Union is being voted upon, no one's opinions should be left untested.
